title: [Self-Directed] Development Process of Higher-Order Thinking Skills (HOTS) Assessment Items for Entrepreneurship

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of business operations and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing entrepreneurial competency assessment tools using math-based problem-solving skills. Conducts real-time video lectures in smartphone-centric environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply higher-order thinking strategies to solve corporate environmental problems using mathematical analysis
Learners can explain a decision-making process utilizing critical thinking skills in creative problem-solving
Learners can develop entrepreneurship assessment items using AI tools and evaluate them at the HOTS (Higher Order Thinking Skills) level (analysis/evaluation/creation)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
